scripts.bump-dependencies: tsx scripts/bump-dependencies.ts @figma/plugin-typings @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin eslint eslint-config-yuanqing eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks eslint-plugin-simple-import-sort eslint-plugin-sort-keys-fix prettier stylelint stylelint-config-yuanqing
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rimraf --glob '*.log' 'packages/*/.turbo' .turbo build node_modules/.cache/turbo
scripts.postinstall: simple-git-hooks && tsx scripts/patch-figma-plugin-typings.ts && npm run build
scripts.prepackages-publish: turbo run fix lint test build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rimraf --glob node_modules package-lock.json './packages/*/node_modules' && npm install
scripts.website-build: npm run website-build:website && npm run website-build:storybook && npm run website-build:figma-plugin-json
scripts.website-build:website: cd packages/website && npm run website-build && cpy './build/**/*' ../../build
scripts.website-build:storybook: cd packages/ui && BASE_URL=/create-figma-plugin/storybook/ npm run storybook-build && cpy './build/**/*' ../../build/create-figma-plugin/storybook

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: npx turbo run fix lint test build
